name: file_put_contents
purpose: Write a string to a file

return.description:
The function returns the number of bytes that were written to the file, or
   FALSE on failure.

notes.description:
A URL can be used as a
filename with this function if the fopen wrappers have been enabled.
See fopen for more details on how to specify the
filename. See the  for links to information
about what abilities the various wrappers have, notes on their usage,
and information on any predefined variables they may
provide.

changelog.change:
Added support for LOCK_EX and the ability to pass
        a stream resource to the data parameter
